# Third-Party Licenses for Test Fixtures

This file documents the licenses for third-party content included in the
MeshPrep test fixtures.

## Thingi10K Test Fixtures

The 3D models in `tests/fixtures/thingi10k/` are sourced from the Thingi10K
dataset and are used for automated testing of mesh repair functionality.

### Dataset Citation

> Qingnan Zhou and Alec Jacobson. "Thingi10K: A Dataset of 10,000 3D-Printing
> Models." 2016.
> https://github.com/Thingi10K/Thingi10K

### License Summary

All models included in this repository have been specifically selected for
their permissive licenses. Models with Non-Commercial (NC) or No-Derivatives
(ND) restrictions are NOT included.

| License Type | Count | Terms |
|--------------|-------|-------|
| CC-BY | 51 | Attribution required |
| CC-BY-SA | 67 | Attribution required, ShareAlike |
| CC0 / Public Domain | 3 | No restrictions |
| GPL | 3 | Source available |
| **Total** | **124** | |

---

## Creative Commons - Attribution (CC-BY)

The following models are licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0.

**License Terms**: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

You are free to:
- Share — copy and redistribute the material
- Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material

Under the following terms:
- Attribution — You must give appropriate credit

**Attribution**: These models were created by various authors on Thingiverse.com.
Original sources can be found at: https://www.thingiverse.com/download:{file_id}

**File IDs**:
42841, 54227, 54228, 54229, 54230, 59758, 59849, 61457, 61458, 61459,
61460, 61462, 61464, 63446, 63447, 63448, 63451, 63452, 63506, 65583,

375236, 449816

You are free to:
- Share — copy and redistribute the material
- Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material

Under the following terms:
- Attribution — You must give appropriate credit
- ShareAlike — Adaptations must use the same license

**Attribution**: These models were created by various authors on Thingiverse.com.
Original sources can be found at: https://www.thingiverse.com/download:{file_id}

## GNU General Public License (GPL)

The following models are licensed under the GNU General Public License.

**License Terms**: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html

You are free to use, modify, and distribute these models under the terms of
the GPL. Source files are available from the original Thingiverse pages.

**File IDs**:
51643, 51660, 771610

**Source**: https://www.thingiverse.com/download:{file_id}

---

## How to Find Original Authors

To find the original author and page for any model:

1. Take the filename (e.g., `42841.stl`)
2. Extract the numeric ID (e.g., `42841`)
3. Visit: `https://www.thingiverse.com/download:42841`

This will redirect to the original Thingiverse "thing" page where you can
find the author's name, original description, and full license terms.

---

## Compliance Notes

- All models in this repository have permissive licenses allowing redistribution
- Attribution is provided in this file and the NOTICE file
- No modifications have been made to the original STL geometry
- Models with NC (Non-Commercial) or ND (No-Derivatives) terms are excluded
- This repository and MeshPrep are licensed under Apache License 2.0
